name: Environaut\Report\Results\Settings\Setting
short_desc: Simple value holder with a name as key and a group name to be used to group/namespace settings.

getName.name: getName
getName.short_desc: Returns the name or key of this setting.

getValue.name: getValue
getValue.short_desc: Return the value of this setting.

getGroup.name: getGroup
getGroup.short_desc: Returns the group name of this setting that may be useful for separating settings by group on export.

matchesFlag.name: matchesFlag
matchesFlag.short_desc: Determines whether this setting's flag value is contained in the given flag value.
matchesFlag.long_desc:
For example: If this setting has a flag of ISetting::NORMAL (1) a given $flag value
 of (ISetting::SENSITIVE | ISetting::WHATEVER) would not match.
matchesFlag.hint_desc: true if this setting's flag is in the given flag

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: setting type value to check against, default is null and matches always

matchesGroup.name: matchesGroup
matchesGroup.short_desc: Determines whether this setting's group matches the given groups.
matchesGroup.hint_desc: true when this setting's group matches the given groups

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string or array with group names, default null matches always

toArray.name: toArray
toArray.short_desc: Returns a flat array with four keys (name, group, value and flag).
toArray.hint_desc: flat associative array representation of this setting

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string with comma separated group names or an array of group names
